    • Method Detail

      • findSunPhotosphere

        public void findSunPhotosphere(ImageExt colorImg,
                               int xOffset,
                               int yOffset,
                               boolean skyIsDarkGrey)
        find sun colored points by searching entire image. The sun's visible radius is the photosphere and that size is known so if the points returned are well fit by a circle or a fraction of a fittable circle, one gets a limit on scale in the image (knowledge of the camera and lens are needed too for projection).
        Parameters:
        colorImg -
        xOffset -
        yOffset -
        skyIsDarkGrey -
